c74object.name: createproject
c74object.digest: Creates a project folder structure from a template
c74object.description: The `createproject` object creates a new directory at the specified path and copies a standard project template into it. It enforces that projects are created within a specific directory structure.

inlet.description: A symbol containing the full path for the new project.

outlet.description: If the log attribute is enabled, this outlet provides status messages.

attribute.name: log
attribute.description: When enabled (1), creates an additional outlet for status information.
